basic.blooming: Flowering period in summer , fruiting period in winter
basic.color: Flower color white or pink, fruit color red

maintenance.soil: Peat or soil with specific nutrients
maintenance.sunlight: Likes half shade, grows in places with scattered light
maintenance.watering: Resistant to flood, water thoroughly after soil surface dries, avoid saturated water
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, apply 1-2 times monthly
maintenance.pruning: Remove aged tissues, dead and pest branches timely
